translated: “Those who give what is difficult to give,
who do what is difficult to do,
the wicked do not repay their kindness,
the way of the good is hard to understand.”
“Therefore the good and the wicked🔽have different destinies in the world;

analyzed: santaḥ sagga parāyaṇā ti  duddada jātakam dasama  kalyāṇa vaggo tatiyaḥ
translated: the good go to heaven.”🔽The Duddadajātaka (Jātaka 1.10)
The Kalyāṇavagga is the third vagga.🔽The summary:
